[[File:Hariyama.png|30px]]Hariyama }} ===Description=== The Kings Rock is a type of [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item]] that can be first encountered in the [[Kanto]] Region, but is first usable in the [[Johto]] Region. ===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !!
